items.title: Computer Science Bachelor's Degree @The Bucharest University of Economic Studies
description: • Studied core computer science topics such as algorithms, data structures, computer architecture, programming languages, and operating systems;
• Gained knowledge and skills in programming languages such as Java, C++, Python, and SQL;
• Developed critical thinking, problem-solving, and analytical skills through assignments, projects, and exams;
• Participated in team projects, working collaboratively with other students to design, develop, and test software applications;
• Completed coursework in topics such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, data mining, and web development;
• Attended various workshops and events organized by the university's computer science department to learn about the latest trends and technologies in the field.

items.title: Teacher module 1 @The Bucharest University of Economic Studies
description: • Completed training to become a certified teacher for students up to 11th grade (16-17 years old);
• Developed lesson plans and teaching materials for computer science topics such as programming basics, data structures, and algorithms;
• Delivered lectures and led discussions in the classroom, providing guidance and support to students as they learned;
• Evaluated student performance through assignments, projects, and exams, providing feedback and grades to help students improve their skills and knowledge.
